Package factory.util

Class ConveyerBelt

  • java.lang.Object
    • factory.util.ConveyerBelt
  • public class ConveyerBelt
extends java.lang.Object
    A ConveyerBelt on which box can be put if the box does not weight more that a maximal wight defined at construction

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ConveyerBelt​(int maxWeight)
      builds a conveyer belt carrying boxes of maximal given
